answers.author: Jonathan Walker
answers.text:
With respect to inspecting buildings and facilities for re-entry as well as permitting repairs, we have done this in multiple communities and would be happy to share our experiences.

author: Grahame Watts
text:
I am seeking information on any public agencies that may have set up an onlibe process for expediatiing the permit process for repairing buidings, inspections following an incident such as an Eathquake, Hurricane or Flood. Roads and general infrsatructure on puiblic and private property that needs to be repaired and opened ASAP is the area we have the most interest.
Any help by October 14 would would be appreciated.
Grahame Watts
City of Thousand Oaks
gwatts@toaks.org
805 449-2453
title: Disaster Recovery - Permit Processing
